seriesStmt.title: Gregor Joseph Werner: A thematic catalogue of his works

annot.p: da capo of the first 37 bars

titlePage.label: [wrapper, fol. 1r, in Werner's hand]
titlePage.p: Missa in Contrapuncto. | Canto, Alto, Tenore, Baſso | Con | Organo e Violone. | Auth: Gregorio Werner

annot.p: This signature comprises two works, this mass (fol. 1r–20v) and the Missa Lydia WerW B.70 (fol. 21r–40v).

titlePage.label: [wrapper]
titlePage.p: in C | Missa in Contrapuncto | a 4 voc: | Canto, Alto, Tenore, Basso | Con | Organo e Violone. | Authore Werner.

annot.p: S, A, T, B, vlne, org
catalogued according to RISM entry and @Muranyi1997
a score by Hubert Dopf which he prepared for his PhD thesis

titlePage.label: [cover title]
titlePage.p: GREGOR WERNER | MISSA IN CONTRAPUNCTO | MISSA LYDIA | 1736 | C.M.BRAND

titlePage.label: [p. 1]
titlePage.p:
[left] Codex 15584. | Nat.Bibl. Wien.
[middle] Missa in Contrapuncto. Canto Alto Tenore Basso Con Organo e Violone | Authre Gregorio Werner. | (Autograph von Werner!) | Riesennoten!!

physMedium.p:
printed staff paper:
(1) “Sünova” Nr.6 1/2 16-zeilig (16 staves, 6mm)
(2) “Sünova” Nr.8 1/2 20-zeilig (20 staves, 6mm)

annot.p: a copy by Carl M. Brand from the autograph manuscript in A-Wn
This shelfmark comprises two works: This mass (p. 1–12) and the Missa lydia alla breve WerW B.63 (p. 13–24).
It is unclear why the masses are dated 1736 in this copy, since none of the existing manuscripts contains any date.

titlePage.label: [wrapper]
titlePage.p: Coena Domini. | Messa in contrapunto | a | 4 Voci | obligati. | Del Sigre Verner.

annot.p: S coro (6), A coro (6), T coro (5), B coro (6), vl 1 (2x; 4, 8), vl 2 (11), vla (4), vlc (4), org (6)
also comprises a Gloria by Benedek Istvánffy
